5.title: Miffy and the Duckling

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Miffy is delighted to make friends with a cute baby duckling - but when the duckling won't stop following her, she has to find a way to get her back to her real mother!

16.title: Miffy's Winter Fun

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: There's so much fun you can have in the snow! Miffy, Melanie, and Grunty play snowballs and snowbunnies, but their plan to make the biggest snowbunny ever doesn't go to plan!

20.title: Miffy and the Midwinter Festival

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: Miffy and her friends are supposed to play a tune at the Midwinter Festival - but Grunty's tuba is broken. How will they make music now?

23.title: Snuffy at School

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot:
Know what this is about?

1.title: Miffy and the Puddles

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

1.plot: Miffy can't play outdoors because it's raining, but she finds she can play all her favorite games inside anyway. Plus, now she can play Jumping in Puddles!

2.title: Miffy and the Dragon

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

2.plot: Uncle Pilot told Miffy her surprise present has 'something to do with dragons.' She thinks it's a dragon egg and sets about trying to hatch it. Fortunately it's actually a delicious dragon fruit!

3.title: Miffy and the Bird

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

3.plot: On a snowy day, Miffy tries to help a bird by bringing him inside. Mommy teaches her that birds don't belong in people's houses, so Miffy makes the bird a house of his own.

4.title: Miffy the Farmer

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

4.plot: When Miffy wants to be a farmer, the real farmer gives her a single seed to take care of. It's not easy being patient with it, but she sticks with it and grows her first sunflower.

5.title: Miffy and the Tennis Match

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

5.plot: Miffy and Melanie don't want Snuffy spoiling their game of tennis - it isn't a game for dogs! But when they lose the ball, they're happy for Snuffy's help - finding balls IS a game for dogs!

6.title: Miffy the Fairy

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

6.plot: Miffy mistakes a stick for a magic wand and tries to do fairy magic. Wanting to cheer her up, Melanie and Grunty conspire to make her think it is working.

7.title: Grunty the Ballerina

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

7.plot: Miffy and Melanie are having a ballet lesson. Grunty wants to play, and the others try to teach her some steps without much success - but Grunty's stompy dance is so much fun she ends up teaching it to everyone!

8.title: Miffy and the Leaves

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

8.plot: A windy day sends leaves flying everywhere. Miffy has fun both tidying them up and chasing after them - and helps finish Aunt Alice's painting along the way!

9.title: Miffy's Camping Adventure

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

9.plot: Miffy isn't sure about camping overnight in Poppy's backyard tent, especially when scary shadows appear at night. But it's only Snuffy the dog coming to join in the outdoor adventure!

10.title: Miffy's Go-Cart

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

10.plot: Grunty is rude to the new boy Dan when she thinks he has a broken go-cart. But once it snows, it's Grunty and Miffy's go-cart that's useless, and they bond over a ride on Dan's sledge.

11.title: Boris's Big Bouquet

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

11.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

12.title: Miffy and the Toy Boat

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

12.plot: Miffy finds a toy boat at her Grandparent's house. It belonged to Daddy as a boy, and Grandpa before him. They all sail it together - and then they sail on Grandpa's NEW boat!

13.title: Miffy's Umbrella

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

13.plot: Miffy insists on taking her new umbrella everywhere even though it's a sunny day. But an umbrella can be surprisingly useful, if you put your mind to it...

14.title: Miffy and the Squeak

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

14.plot: When Miffy can't help making embarrassing squeaking noises in class, it turns out that her chair is squeaky. Just the thing for making a noise like a mouse for the school song!

15.title: Miffy Goes Bowling

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

15.plot: When Grunty shows an unexpected knack for bowling, Melanie gets huffy. Miffy teaches her that everyone's good at different things, and it's better to learn from them than spite them.

16.title: Miffy at the Beach

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

16.plot: Miffy tries to make a sandcastle on the beach, but it keeps falling apart. Disappointed that Melanie's sandcastle is better, Miffy collects shells instead. The shells turn out to be the perfect thing to decorate the sandcastle.

17.title: Miffy and the Clouds

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

17.plot: Miffy goes cloud-watching with Grandma, and they have fun spotting different shapes. Miffy is convinced that one shaped like Snuffy the dog wants them to follow her. Come on Grandma, get moving!

18.title: Boris Is Broken

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

18.plot: Boris has, inevitably, fallen out of a tree and broken his arm. Miffy's not sure she wants to see 'Broken Boris' in the hospital - but when a doctor needs an assistant, 'Doctor Miffy' rises to the challenge!

19.title: Uncle Pilot's Postcard

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

19.plot: Uncle Pilot sends Miffy a postcard full of exciting news of his travels. She wants to send one back, but what does she have to write about? Fortunately, a trip to the post office is full of excitement!

20.title: Miffy and the Crocodile

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

20.plot: A mix-up with school bags leads to Miffy spending the night with someone else's toy. Instead of her soft teddy bear, she has Dan's snappy crocodile! Can she learn to love something so different - and who has her teddy bear?

21.title: Miffy's New Kite

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

21.plot: Miffy wants to fly a kite with her friends, but the kite is broken. A quest to get it repaired proves fruitless, but the people she helped along the way help her in return, and Boris makes her an amazing new kite.

22.title: Miffy the Queen of the Castle

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

22.plot: Daddy has hired a bouncy castle for an end-of-school treat. Miffy, Melanie, and Grunty all enjoy bouncing along. Daddy wants a turn too - let's hope it can take his weight...

23.title: Grandma's Pear Cake

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

23.plot: Miffy learns that Grandma is known for her pear cake and wants to taste it. There's one tiny problem - no pears! A trip to the market leads Miffy to invent the strawberry and carrot cake - will it be just as tasty?

24.title: Poppy's Nature Hunt

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

24.plot: Poppy takes Miffy and Grunty on a nature hunt - but when she 'finds' the prickly bush, she loses their map to the wind. Will they be able to find their way back home in time for tea?

25.title: Dan's Lost Toy

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

25.plot: When Dan's new toy goes missing, Miffy helps him hunt for it. Grunty 'just happens' to have found an incredibly similar toy. She doesn't want to accept that it's Dan's, and it's up to Miffy to persuade her to do the right thing.

26.title: Aunt Alice Is Poorly

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

26.plot: When Aunt Alice is unwell, Miffy works hard to bring her things she might like to cheer her up. When Miffy catches Alice's cold, Aunt Alice returns the favor.

27.title: Miffy Takes the Lead

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

27.plot: Miffy and Dan are putting on a 'play' for Mommy and Daddy. Miffy loves being Red Riding Hood, but can she convince Dan that he's right for the part of the Big Bad Wolf?

28.title: Miffy and the Thunderstorm

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

28.plot: When a storm breaks out as they're playing at Miffy's house, Miffy discovers that Grunty is scared of thunder. Can she convince her friend there's nothing to be scared of?

29.title: Miffy at the Library

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

29.plot: Aunt Alice is helping out at the library, which means Miffy and Grunty get to help out too. The girls have a great time playing librarian, although their innovative book-filing system nearly leads to disaster!

30.title: Grunty Where Are You?

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

30.plot: Grunty is the worst hide and seek player in the world - until a misunderstanding suddenly makes her the BEST hide and seek player in the world. Well, second best - the best is Snuffy who finally finds her!

31.title: Uncle Pilot's Treasure Map

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

31.plot: Uncle Pilot turns Miffy's hand-drawn map of the village into a treasure map that leads her to his plane - the most precious thing he has! And Miffy's reward is a trip through the clouds.

32.title: Miffy the Waitress

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

32.plot: At the summer fete, Miffy helps Poppy Pig run the refreshment stall by taking everyone's orders. But there's a lot of different things to remember!

33.title: Miffy and the Snail

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

33.plot: Miffy makes friends with a snail while picking strawberries at Poppy's house. When it hitches a ride home with her, she realizes she needs to find somewhere safe to re-home it.

34.title: Miffy and the Star

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

34.plot: Miffy finds a star on the beach - has it fallen out of the sky? No, it's a starfish - and Miffy rides out in a boat with Boris to get it back to its family.

35.title: Uncle Pilot's Amazing Plane

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

35.plot: Uncle Pilot takes Miffy and her friends on an amazing airplane ride without leaving the front room! You can go anywhere with a little imagination - just look out for imaginary pirates!

36.title: Mummy Gets a Surprise

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

36.plot: Daddy is planning a surprise party for Mummy's birthday. All Miffy has to do is keep her out of the way while they get everything ready - how hard can it be?

37.title: Grandpa and the Ghost

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

37.plot: Grandpa's silly stories are very funny - until he accidentally convinces Miffy there's a ghost in the wardrobe when she comes to stay the night! With Grandma's help, Miffy gets to sleep - and Grandpa gets taught a lesson!

38.title: Boris on Ice

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

38.plot: When Miffy finds out that Boris can't ice skate, she offers to help out. Nothing seems to help - until Miffy realizes that the chair Boris mended for her could come in handy...

39.title: Miffy's New Bicycle

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

39.plot: Miffy's very proud of how fast she can go on her new bike - until she takes a tumble. When she needs to go fast to come to Snuffy's rescue, will she be brave enough to ride fast again?

40.title: Miffy's Lucky Dip

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

40.plot: Miffy is running a lucky dip stall at the school fair, but when none of her friends pull out anything they want, it seems to be turning into an UN-lucky dip! Can Miffy find a way to turn her fortune around?

41.title: Miffy's Concert

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

41.plot: All of Miffy's friends can play instruments, and Miffy wants to play along with them on the recorder that her teacher gave her. But she can't make it sound good - at least, not without lots of practice!

42.title: Dan the Big Bad Wolf

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

42.plot: Miffy, Melanie, and Grunty play Follow My Leader. After a few false starts, Miffy takes the lead - and ends up leading everyone on a massive, musical adventure!

43.title: Miffy and the Pancakes

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

43.plot: Barbara Bear is coming to babysit, hurray! The two girls have lots of fun together, especially when Miffy teaches Barbara how to make pancakes. Let's just hope they can tidy up in time...

44.title: Miffy Helps Out

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

44.plot: Mummy needs Miffy's help, but so does Grunty! Miffy's so tied up in running Mummy's errand, she feels she can't stop to help her friend, but Barbara reminds her that real friends always help.

45.title: Miffy and the Goldfish

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

45.plot: Dan leaves Miffy his new pet goldfish to look after while he's on holiday. Miffy finds it's harder to take care of a goldfish than you might think, especially if you carry it around with you all day!

46.title: Miffy's Ice Cream

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

46.plot: Boris can't serve anyone an ice-cream from his refrigerated bike until he gets rid of his unfortunate hiccups, so Miffy helps out - both by serving ice-cream, and finding a surprising way to cure Boris!

47.title: Miffy and the Butterfly

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

47.plot: Miffy has fun chasing a butterfly from place to place, from on top of a flower to on top of Daddy's head! When she loses it, she finds a way to find it again - and all of the butterfly's friends too.

48.title: Snuffy the Sheepdog

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

48.plot: Miffy's garden is invaded by sheep who've escaped from the farm, and Snuffy lends a paw in getting them rounded up again!

49.title: Miffy and the Missing Eggs

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

49.plot: Daddy can't make his special scrambled eggs, because the egg delivery has gone missing. Miffy turns detective to track them down, following a trail of clues to the farm.

50.title: Daddy the Plumber

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

50.plot: Miffy finds a dripping tap, and Daddy's attempts to fix it - despite Miffy's warnings - almost lead to a watery disaster. Boris saves the day, but will Daddy learn his lesson?

51.title: Melanie and the School Trip

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

51.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

52.title: Uncle Pilot Saves the Day

episode of.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small (TV Series 2015– )

52.plot: Miffy is worried about Snuffy - she has never gone this long without seeing her before. Is she lost? A search of the village fails to find her - until Uncle Pilot suggests looking from higher up!

imdb.title: Miffy's Adventures Big and Small
plot: Miffy is a charming bunny-rabbit who lives in a little house with red shutters and a red roof among green fields. She is adventurous and likes to go out with her friends and discover simple things about the world around her.
